foods.name: Oatmeal
foods.imageAlt: image of a bowl of oatmeal
foods.story: I used to eat oatmeal everyday before school. It was the instant kind, but it was just right to get my day started :)

foods.name: PB & J
foods.imageAlt: image of a pb & j sandwich
foods.story: My grandparents would make these for us to pack on camping trips!
